mapper.select: select JJD_DocNo, to_char(JJD_JRDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as JJD_JRDate, JJD_UserID, JJD_ChebSts, JJD_KmsaSts, JJD_Cmnt, fn_getUserName(JJD_UserID) as UserName, CASE WHEN NOT ( select count(*) from JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY where JJDKY_JRNo = JJD_DocNo AND to_char(JJD_JRDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(JJDKY_KSDateYY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as KYLstCHK, CASE WHEN NOT ( select count(*) from JN_JINRYO_DATE_CB,MF_DRUG_INFO where JJDCB_DrugCode = MDI_DrugCode and JJDCB_JRNo = JJD_DocNo AND to_char(JJD_JRDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(JJDCB_CBDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as CBDataCHK, CASE WHEN NOT ( select count(*) from BZ_DATA_ATCH where BDA_DocNo = JJD_DocNo AND to_char(JJD_JRDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(BDA_BzDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as FileCHK from JN_JINRYO_DATE where JJD_DocNo=#{JJJ_DOCNO} order by JJD_DocNo, JJD_JRDate

SELECT rownum as SEQ, e.* FROM ( select BDA_AtchFile, BDA_Cmnt, BDA_UpPath, BDA_CntntType, to_char(nvl(BDA_BzDate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as BDA_BzDate from BZ_DATA_ATCH where BDA_DocNo=#{JJJ_DOCNO} and BDA_BzCls1='JR001' ) e

SELECT rownum as SEQ, e.* FROM ( select to_char(JJDKY_KSDateYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDateYY, to_char(nvl(JJDKY_KSDate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDate, JJDKY_KSNo, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(500, 501, JJDKY_KSNo) as KSName, JJDKY_KSSts, JJDKY_Cmnt from JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY where JJDKY_JRNo=#{JJJ_DOCNO} order by JJDKY_KSDateYY, JJDKY_KSNo ) e

SELECT rownum as SEQ, e.* FROM ( select JJDCB_DocNo, JJDCB_JRNo, JJDCB_DrugCode, JJDCB_UseVol, JJDCB_Cmnt, MDI_Name, MDI_Unit, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('600', '602', MDI_Unit) as UnitName, to_char(nvl(JJDCB_CBDate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDCB_CBDate from JN_JINRYO_DATE_CB, MF_DRUG_INFO where JJDCB_DrugCode = MDI_DrugCode and JJDCB_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO} order by JJDCB_CBDate, MDI_DrugCode ) e

select JJDKY_DocNo ,JJDKY_KSNo from JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY where JJDKY_KSType = '1' AND JJDKY_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
AND to_char(JJDKY_KSDateYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{DTLDay}

SELECT rownum as SEQ, e.* FROM ( select fn_getAniClsName(MAI_AniCode, '1') as Cls1Name, MAC_Name, MAI_BName, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as SexName, MAI_AniCode, to_char(MAI_Birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') as MAI_Birthday, PDR_PSPlace, PDR_BukmReq, PBR_DocNo, to_char(PBR_BuDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as PBR_BuDate, PBR_BUDzzName, PBR_KSReslt from MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS, PS_DETH_REPT, PS_BUKM_REPT where MAI_AniCode = PDR_AniCode and MAC_AniClsCode = MAI_AniClsCode and PBR_ReqDocNo = PDR_DocNo and PBR_DocNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO} ) e
select NVL(max(BDA_BzSeqNo),0)+1 from BZ_DATA_ATCH where BDA_DocNo = #{value} AND BDA_BzCls1 = 'JR001'

select MAI_AniCode, MAI_AniClsCode, MAI_BName, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as SexName, MAI_VvrmNo, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName,to_char(MAI_Birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') as MAI_Birthday, MAC_Name, MAC_EName, to_char(nvl(DAIO_IODate, to_date('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place, CASE WHEN MAI_Birthday IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday)/12) || '년 ' || TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday) - TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_Birthday)/12) * 12) || '개월' ELSE '' END AS CURAGE from MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO where DAIO_IOType = '1' and DAIO_AniCode = #{value} and rownum <= 1 order by DAIO_IODate asc ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode where MAI_AniCode = #{value} and MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode
mapper.update: update JN_JINRYO_DATE set JJD_UserID = #{USERID}, JJD_Cmnt = #{J_CMNT}, CMN_DEL_STS='N', CMN_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG='TREAT0403', CMN_UPD_ID=#{USERID} where JJD_DocNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO} and JJD_JRDate = to_date(#{DTLDay}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
update JN_JINRYO_RC set JJR_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}, JJR_RCSts = #{RCSTS}, CMN_DEL_STS='N', CMN_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG='TREAT0403', CMN_UPD_ID=#{USERID} where JJR_DocNo = #{DOCNO}
Update JN_JINRYO_RC set JJR_JRNo = '' where JJR_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
mapper.insert: insert into JN_JINRYO_DATE ( JJD_DocNo, JJD_JRDate, JJD_UserID, JJD_ChebSts, JJD_KmsaSts, JJD_Cmnt, JJD_DrugCmnt, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) values (#{JJJ_DOCNO}, to_date(#{DTLDay}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{USERID}, '', '', #{J_CMNT}, '', 'N', SYSDATE,'TREAT0403',#{USERID},SYSDATE,'TREAT0403',#{USERID})

insert into JN_JINRYO_JNL ( JJJ_DocNo, JJJ_SDate, JJJ_EDate, JJJ_JRType, JJJ_RCNo, JJJ_JRDzzName, JJJ_JRCmnt, JJJ_JRDzzType, JJJ_JRSts, JJJ_Insu, JJJ_ReqOrga, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) values(#{JJJ_DOCNO}, to_date(#{SDATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{EDATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{JRTYPE}, #{DOCNO}, #{JRDZZNAME},#{JRCMNT},#{JRDZZTYPE},#{JRSTS},#{INSU},#{REQORGA}, 'N', SYSDATE,'TREAT0403',#{USERID},SYSDATE,'TREAT0403',#{USERID})

INSERT INTO BZ_DATA_ATCH(BDA_DOCNO, BDA_BZCLS1, BDA_BZCLS2, BDA_BZCLS3, BDA_BZSEQNO, BDA_BZDATE, BDA_CNTNTTYPE, BDA_UPPATH, BDA_ATCHFILE, BDA_CMNT, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) VALUES(#{BDA_DOCNO}, #{BDA_BZCLS1}, #{BDA_BZCLS2}, #{BDA_BZCLS3}, #{BDA_BZSEQNO}, to_date(#{DTLDay}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{BDA_CNTNTTYPE}, #{BDA_UPPATH}, #{BDA_ATCHFILE}, #{BDA_CMNT}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{CMN_MAK_PROG}, #{CMN_MAK_ID}, SYSDATE, #{CMN_UPD_PROG}, #{CMN_UPD_ID})
mapper.delete:
delete from JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY where JJDKY_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
AND to_char(JJDKY_KSDateYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{DTLDay}

delete from JN_JINRYO_DATE_CB where JJDCB_JRNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
AND to_char(JJDCB_CBDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{DTLDay}

delete from JN_JINRYO_DATE where JJD_DocNo = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
AND to_char(JJD_JRDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{DTLDay}
